member.name: M:ScottPlot.WPF.WpfPlotBase.GetPlotPixelPosition(System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Returns the position of the mouse pointer relative to Plot drawing surface.
member.param: Provides data for mouse related routed events
member.returns: The x and y coordinates in pixel of the mouse pointer position relative to Plot. The point (0,0) is the upper-left corner of the plot.
